long_description: The girls' Marmot Helsinki down jacket snuggles girls in sweet, packable warmth and authentic outdoor style with minimal weight-perfect for cold-weather adventures on mountains or across town. Mini ripstop polyester shell is filled with 700-fill-power goose down for lightweight warmth; Durable Water Repellent treatment resists moisture. Three-panel hood offers fitted warmth and a removable faux fur fringe; lined collar and chin guard wick away moisture and lie soft against skin. Windflap on front zipper protects against drafts; drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs seal in warmth. The Marmot Helsinki down jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets, interior zip stash pocket, microfleece internal cuffs and a ribbed hem.
short_description: The girls' Marmot Helsinki down jacket snuggles girls in sweet, packable warmth and authentic outdoor style with minimal weight-perfect for cold-weather adventures on mountains or across town.
